p: By contrast, CD8+ T cells recognize non-self presented by MHC-I on any transformed or virally infected cell. That step is also accompanied by a pro-inflammatory cytokine storm, although the predominant ones are of the interferon family (IFN, e.g., INF-g). As for their CD4+ counterpart, CD8+ T cell activation is successful and productive when both TcR and CD28 are engaged, lest it leads to either anergy or apoptosis as outlined above.
